attributes.action: Make Iain Dowie announce the results for the UK at the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.additional_details:
EFL Cup
Successful Cup Draw
Quotes: 'ooh'
Further quote: 'that will be a cracking tie'
Iain sometimes gets excited and may be heard breathing heavily, this adds to the excitement and tension
attributes.background: Iain Dowie is an iconic footballing character. He has recently been hugely successful in drawing balls out of a plastic cup for a domestic football trophy (EFL Cup). It is only fair that Iain's ability to pronounce numbers is now broadcast on a world stage.

rejection.details: All the arrangements for UK participation in the Eurovision Song Contest, organised by the European Broadcasting Union, are the responsibility of the BBC: the UK Government and the UK Parliament have no responsibility for these arrangements.
